item.title: Announcing a New Microsoft Security Virtual Training Day
item.description:
We’re thrilled to announce a brand-new opportunity for learning and growth: Microsoft Virtual Training Day: Strength Cloud Security with Microsoft Defender for Cloud! This free, online event is designed to empower professionals with the skills and knowledge needed to thrive in today’s digital landscape. During this training, you’ll be able to:
Learn how to increase cloud security using Microsoft Defender for Cloud and how to deploy security across your DevOps workflows. Discover how to detect risks, maintain compliance, and protect hybrid and multicloud environments. Find out how to defend se...
